entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hearst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
